boardgame.name: Les Charlatans de Belcastel
Ciarlatani di Quedlinburgo
Kuruzslók Quedlinburgban
De Kwakzalvers van Kakelenburg
Pócimas y brebajes
The Quacks of Quedlinburg
Die Quacksalber von Quedlinburg
Szarlatani z Pasikurowic
boardgame.description: In The Quacks of Quedlinburg, players are charlatans _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or quack doctors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; each making their own secret brew by adding ingredients one at a time. Take care with what you add, though, for a pinch too much of this or that will spoil the whole mixture!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has their own bag of ingredient chips. During each round, they simultaneously draw chips and add them to their pot. The higher the face value of the drawn chip, the further it is placed in the swirling pattern. Push your luck as far as you can, but if you add too many cherry bombs, your pot explodes!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of each round, players gain victory points and also coins to spend on new ingredients to add to their bags. But players with exploded pots must choose points or coins _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; not both! The player with the most victory points at the end of nine rounds wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
